content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv
With
( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
  FORMAT_OPTIONS (
	FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|'
    )
)

DROP external table ext_dimActors
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_dimActors
(
    [ActorSK] [int] NOT NULL,
	[ActorID] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL,
	[ActorName] [VARCHAR](81) NULL,
	[ActorGender] [char](1) NULL
)
WITH
 LOCATION = 'dimproduct',
    DATA_SOURCE = ADLSHack2,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv,
    REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
    REJECT_VALUE = 0    
)
GO
